## SimpleExpressionNode interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SimpleExpressionNode extends Node 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Node

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [hoisted](./compiler-core.simpleexpressionnode.hoisted.md) | [JSChildNode](./compiler-core.jschildnode.md) | Indicates this is an identifier for a hoist vnode call and points to the hoisted node. |
|  [identifiers](./compiler-core.simpleexpressionnode.identifiers.md) | string\[\] | an expression parsed as the params of a function will track the identifiers declared inside the function body. |

|  [isRuntimeConstant](./compiler-core.simpleexpressionnode.isruntimeconstant.md) | boolean | some expressions (e.g. transformAssetUrls import identifiers) are constant, but cannot be stringified because they must be first evaluated at runtime. |
